message: Let's start with a generous offer, Bob. Accept and we can call it a day!
Let's split it 50/50, Alice. It's a fair start.
Not bad, Bob, but I was thinking of a slightly more generous split. Let's keep negotiating!
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. This way, you'll get a decent chunk, and I'll still get a good amount.
I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share, Alice, but I still think I deserve more.
Still a bit too one-sided, Bob. I was thinking of a more balanced split.
Let's find a middle ground, Bob. This way, we both get a decent share.
I'm willing to compromise, Alice. I think I deserve a bit more, but this is a fair offer.
Still a bit too skewed towards you, Bob. I'm starting to get worried we'll end up with nothing.
I'm starting to get a bit desperate, Bob. This is my last moderate offer. Take it or leave it!
I'm not going to back down, Alice. I think I deserve more, and this is my best offer.
You're really pushing your luck, Bob. I'm not going to accept such a tiny share. Get serious!
Fine, Bob. I'll give you most of it. Just don't expect me to go any lower!
